short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the WebStart+ New Tab for quick access to your most visited sites, web search and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"WebStart+" is a search extension designed to declutter your digital environment, thereby facilitating a speedy search process. It not only conserves precious time for the user but also serves them with contextually appropriate results.

The extension operates across one of the world's biggest search engines - Bing, Yahoo, or Google, contingent upon your geographical location.
